short_summary: A modified shipping container or trailer for use as a modular laboratory unit.
description: This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number 23232-220649/A dated November 9, 2022 with a closing of April 6, 2022 at 14:00 EDT. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offeors/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation. Public Service and Procurement Canada (PSPC) has a requirement for a modified shipping container or trailer for use as a modular laboratory unit. The laboratory unit will be used to accommodate two small research systems, and one operator station.The design and construction of the research systems is not within the scope of this project.
tags: Regions of Delivery:  National Capital Region (NCR)

full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

**RFQ for Modified Shipping Container or Trailer for Modular Laboratory Unit**

Procurement Category: Goods and Services
Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding

*Request for Proposal ID: WS4011447752*
*Amendment Number: 4*
*Publication Date: May 16, 2023*
*Tender Closing Date: July 12, 2023, at 14:00:00 EDT*

**Important Update:**
Note that the closing time for submission of bids has been extended to July 12, 2023, at 14:00:00 EDT. Submissions received after this deadline will be deemed non-responsive.

**Background:**
Public Service and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites bids from interested suppliers for a customized shipping container or trailer to be used as a modular laboratory unit for Natural Resources Canada.

**Key Requirements:**

*   Design and manufacture of a modified shipping container or trailer to serve as a modular laboratory unit.
*   Accommodation of two small research systems and one operator station.
*   The laboratory unit will be used to support research activities.

**After Action:**
This solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number 23232-220649/A dated November 9, 2022, with a closing of April 6, 2022, at 14:00:00 EDT.

**Contract Details:**

*   **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **End User Entity:** Department of Natural Resources (NRCan)
*   **Contact Information:**
    *   Tea, Richard (SPAC/PSC) - richard.tea@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Procurement Information:**

*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
*   **Trade Agreements:**
    *   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
    *   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
    *   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
    *   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** None specified
*   **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)


**Bidder Information:**
For more information, please refer to the [Notice URL](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16295099?extsite=
